name: Rodent
description:
[ FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE ] 

[ This game is intended to be played from the start and in one sitting. Due to complications with the Itch upload and cookies, data carries over if you exit the page which can lead to game breaking bugs. To circumvent this, please delete cookies before launching the game. I am currently working on a fix for this so the game automatically restarts regardless of cookies. I apologize for the inconvenience. ]

-------------

Trapped in the Blinding White, lost in those repeating walls.

You have reached your first crossroad.

Life is around one corner, death around the other. 

Choose your turn...

-------------

Check out Eggchanted.com for behind the scene insight into RODENT
